structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXIII(S). NORTH CENTRAL URBAN AREA DISTRICT (NCUAD)

text.section:
Sec. 33-284.99.52. Development Parameters.
Except as otherwise provided in this section, all new development and redevelopment within the NCUAD shall comply with the development parameters as set forth in Article XXXIII(K) of this chapter.
All new development and redevelopment in areas designated MCS shall comply with the development parameters for the MC area as set forth in Article XXXIII(K) of this chapter, except that self-service gas stations shall comply with the development parameters applicable to the BU-1A district as set forth in Section 33-247
At a minimum, streets within the NCUAD shall comply with the Street Type Parameters for Type 5, Minor Street, as provided in Section 33-284.85
Buffering between dissimilar land uses shall be in accordance with Section 18A-6(H) of this code.
Where a proposed development abuts an area designated for single-family residential on the Future Land Use Map of the CDMP, the height of the proposed development along the abutting property line, for a minimum depth of 50 feet, shall be no greater than three stories.
